title: Mbiri Yachidule Ya Art in Space - Orbital Temple
heading: Mbiri Yachidule ya Art in Space
intro: Chiyambireni kukhazikitsidwa kopambana kwa satellite yochita kupanga mu 1957 , ma satelayiti opitilira 10,000 abwera kudzazungulira Dziko Lapansi. Mu nthawi yatsopanoyi, ojambula apeza njira yowonjezera machitidwe awo ndipo mlengalenga wasanduka mtundu watsopano wa nsalu. Ndi izi, mafunso ofunikira okhudza ndale zakufufuza zakuthambo abuka - ngakhale pali zina zambiri zomwe siziyenera kufotokozedwa.

leonov.text: Chojambula choyamba chopangidwa mumlengalenga chinali chojambula cha kutuluka kwa dzuwa pa Dziko Lapansi, chopangidwa ndi katswiri wa zakuthambo wa ku Russia Alexei Leonov ali paulendo wa Voskhod 2 mu 1965 .
leonov.caption: Chidutswa choyamba chopangidwa mumlengalenga, ndi mapensulo Alexei Leonov adachijambula. Chithunzi: Museum of Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Zaka zitatu pambuyo pake, Moon Museum , mbale ya ceramic ya miniscule yomwe imati inafika pa Mwezi ndi zolemba zisanu ndi chimodzi mwa ojambula otchuka kwambiri ku US panthawiyo: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers ndi Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Chithunzi cha Moon Museum kuchokera ku nkhani yoyambirira ya New York Times. Chala chachikulu chimabisa kujambula kwa Warhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Chothandizira chokopa cha Warhol - pamwamba kumanzere - chinapangitsa kuti ntchitoyi ikhale yovuta kwa ofalitsa mauthenga panthawiyo.
moonMuseum.caption2: Chithunzi chomwe New York Times inasankha kusindikiza, ndi zojambula zomwe zikuwonekera pansipa ndi zojambula za Andy Warhol pakona yakumanzere kumanzere.

fallenAstronaut.text: Mu 1971 , chojambula chaching'ono cha aluminiyamu cha humanoid chotchedwa Fallen Astronaut chinayikidwa pa Mwezi ndi Apollo 15 wa mumlengalenga David Scott . Wojambula waku Belgian Paul Van Hoeydonck adafuna, ndi chidutswa ichi, kuti azikumbukira akatswiri a zakuthambo ndi zakuthambo omwe adamwalira pakupititsa patsogolo kufufuza kwamlengalenga.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Kuyang'ana kwa chipilala Chachikumbutso chomwe chinasiyidwa pamwezi pamalo otsetsereka a Hadley-Apennine.

pioneerVoyager.text: M'zaka za m'ma 1970 , a Pioneer Plaques ndi Voyager Probes adakhazikitsa njira zatsopano zaluso zamlengalenga. Atanyamula zolembera za aluminiyamu zokhala ndi golide zokhala ndi mauthenga owoneka kuchokera ku Dziko lapansi kupita kwa oyenda m'mlengalenga aliwonse omwe angawapeze mtsogolo muno, amawonetsa moyo wamunthu m'zinthu zake zofunika kwambiri.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Zikwangwani 10 ndi 11 za Pioneer 11, zomwe zidalowetsedwa mumlengalenga mu 1970s.

dove.text: Mu 1990 , dziko la Brazil linasiya chizindikiro chake m'derali ndi DOVE/OSCAR-17 , setilaiti yanzeru yamasewera yamphamvu kwambiri yandakatulo. Ngakhale kuti mlengi wake sanadziwone ngati wojambula, inali ntchito yandakatulo kwambiri: idalemba mawu a ana opempha mtendere ndikuwatumiza kwa anthu ochita masewera a pawailesi oposa zikwi ziwiri padziko lonse lapansi, ndikusintha CubeSat yochita upainiya kukhala ntchito yomveka pamodzi.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, setilaiti ya ndakatulo yaku Brazil yotumiza mawu a ana amtendere, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Mu 2012 , wojambula Trevor Paglen adayambitsa "Zithunzi Zomaliza" , kabuku kakang'ono kakang'ono kakang'ono kamene kamakhala ndi zithunzi za 100 zomwe zimagwirizanitsidwa ndi satellite ya mauthenga a Echostar XVI mu geostationary orbit. Zapangidwa kuti zikhale zaka mabiliyoni ambiri, zimapangidwira kuti zipitirire patsogolo chitukuko cha anthu monga zofukulidwa zakale zamtsogolo.
lastPictures.caption: The Last Pictures, disk-etched micro-etched diski yopangidwa kuti ikhale yoposa umunthu, yomwe idakhazikitsidwa mu 2012.

ulises.text: Mu 2015 , Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) inayambitsa Ulises I , nanosatellite yomwe inapangidwa ngati opera yamaganizo motsogoleredwa ndi wojambula Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Kanemayo adanyamulidwa kupita ku stratosphere pa baluni pa Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Amapangidwa kuti aziphulika pafupifupi maola anayi ndikutsika ndi parachute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, masewero a satellite opangidwa ndi Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Sizinafike mpaka 2014 pomwe satellite yoyamba yaluso idakhazikitsidwa. Pulojekiti ya University of Tokyo's ARTSAT-1 Invader idatumiza zambiri zapadziko lapansi zomwe zidagwiritsidwa ntchito popanga zaluso komanso kupanga nyimbo.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader chimango ndi zida zosinthira zomwe zidatsalira Padziko Lapansi.
artsat.caption2: ntchito [SPACE x ART] - kupitilira chiwonetsero cha Cosmologies chomwe chinachitikira ku Museum of Contemporary Art Tokyo

kac.text: Wojambula wamakono wa ku Brazil ndi ku America Eduardo Kac wathandizira luso la mlengalenga kudzera mu mgwirizano ndi NASA ndi SpaceX . "Inner Telescope" yake ( 2017 ), yomwe inapangidwa ndi katswiri wa zakuthambo wa ku France Thomas Pesquet , inachititsa kuti pakhale chithunzi chopangidwa mu International Space Station .
kac.caption: Inner Telescope pa International Space Station, yopangidwa ndi wasayansi waku France Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: Mu 2018 , CubeSat yokhazikika yomwe idamangidwa ngati pulojekiti yaukadaulo idakhazikitsidwa mozungulira. Yopangidwa ndi wojambula zithunzi wa ku bahamian Tavares Strachan , Enoch ali ndi mtsuko wa 24-karat-golide wakuda ndi kuphulika kwa astronaut woyamba wa ku Africa-America, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr.
enoch.caption: ENOCH (gawo lowonetsera), 2015-2017. ⓒ Tavares Strachan, chithunzi ⓒ Museum Associates/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: M'chaka chomwecho, Trevor Paglen's Orbital Reflector idakhazikitsidwanso ngati chosema chosungidwa mu CubeSat yosagwira ntchito. Ntchitoyi inali luso laluso lofuna kusintha momwe timaonera malo athu padziko lapansi. Sanatumizidwe molondola. Ngakhale kuti silinatsegulidwe monga momwe linapangidwira, linayambitsa zokambirana zofunika kwambiri ndipo linapereka mayankho ochokera kwa akatswiri a zakuthambo, asayansi, ma TV, aphunzitsi, ophunzira, ndi anthu onse padziko lonse lapansi, kusonyeza kuti luso lopambana siliyenera kukhala lopambana mwaukadaulo.
orbitalReflector.caption: Kupereka Kwa digito kwa Orbital Reflector, 2018

others.text: Ojambula ena ambiri athandizira nawo pazaluso zakuthambo, aliyense akubweretsa malingaliro apadera pakufufuza kwawo. Ntchito zodziwikiratu zikuphatikiza kafukufuku wojambula zakuthambo wa Sarah Jane Pell yemwe amafufuza momwe anthu amagwirira ntchito m'malo ovuta kwambiri; Pulojekiti ya Agnes Meyer-Brandis ya Moon Goose Analogue yowunika mbiri yakale komanso zamasiku ano zakufufuza zakuthambo; Pulogalamu ya Nahumu's AstroArts yotsogolera kuyesa kwa microgravity; ndi chosema cha Arthur Woods's Cosmic Dancer , chosema choyamba chowonetsedwa mumlengalenga mu Mir station mu 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Mu 2025 , pambuyo pa zaka 4 zafukufuku ndi chitukuko, wojambula wa ku Brazil Edson Pavoni ndi gulu la anthu ambiri ogwira nawo ntchito adzayambitsa Orbital Temple , satellite yojambula yomwe imayitana aliyense padziko lapansi kuti atumize mayina ozungulira, ndikupanga chikumbutso chophatikizana kwambiri kupitirira malire.
orbitalTemple.caption: Kachisi wa Orbital ku Mercosul Bienal. Chithunzi: Clara Marques
